assertions.assertion:
The function int pthread_attr_getschedpolicy(const pthread_attr_t *restrict attr, int *restrict policy);
gets the schedpolicy attribute in the 'attr' argument.
The supported values of policy will include SCHED_FIFO, SCHED_RR, and SCHED_OTHER.
If success, the function returns zero; otherwise, an error number shall be returned indicating the error.
